heading: HB00086
0: AN ACT AMENDING SECTION 150 OF REPUBLIC ACT 8424, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, AS AMENDED
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2016-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00086
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTION 150 OF REPUBLIC ACT 8424, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Seeks to impose tariff and customs duties, excise tax and value added tax on perfumes and toilet waters with perfume/essential oil content of more than three (3%) by average weight.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : JALOSJOS, SETH FREDERICK P.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2016-07-26
